definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
variant of 合併|合并[he2 bing4]
to stand side by side/to be juxtaposed
variant of 一併|一并, to lump together/to treat along with all the others
to exist at the same time/to coexist
to lay equal stress on/to pay equal attention to
to discuss two disparate things together (idiom); to mention on equal terms/to place on a par with/(often with negatives: impossible to mention X in the same breath as Y)
to proceed in parallel/side by side (of two processes, developments, thoughts etc)
to run neck and neck/to keep pace with/to keep abreast of/on a par with one another

sentences.english: They could even count the fruit in Soviet orchards and analyze their crops.
sentences.chinese: 他們甚至可以數出蘇聯果園裏的果樹並分析其產量。

sentences.english: Jia-wen Luo do the experimental investigation and make a research summary and finish the research report.
sentences.chinese: 由羅家文進行實驗探究並將成果彙總並製成研究報告。

sentences.english: He self-reflected and decided to decrease the stress and clean up his diet, looking beyond the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 他能自我反醒並決定減少壓力和調整飲食，改變現狀。

sentences.english: Miss Athill did not keep the letters she received from Mr Field.
sentences.chinese: 阿西爾女士並沒有保留菲爾德先生寫給她的信件。

sentences.english: First impressions of Sumatra are not good.
sentences.chinese: 蘇門答臘給我的第一印象並不好。

sentences.english: When finished with the list, click OK then close out of Local Group Policy Editor.
sentences.chinese: 完成列表後，點擊確定並關閉本地組策略編輯器。

sentences.english: The Rapel Valley weather ripened fruit slowly , and Cabernet Sauvignon developed intense flavours.
sentences.chinese: 蘭佩谷的氣候使得葡萄成熟緩慢，並帶有濃郁的香氣。

sentences.english: In this paper, we propose a mathematical model of planar reflector on the Solar pond.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了太陽池反射板的數學模型，並進行了計算。

sentences.english: Commitment to animal welfare issues and to promoting IFAW's mission.
sentences.chinese: 理解動物福利理念，並願意推動IFAW宗旨。

sentences.english: Moni tor work quality and feedback abnormality to WT engineer.
sentences.chinese: 監督工作質量並及時向工程師反饋異常。

sentences.english: This reduces the complexity of our work and offers run time performance improvements.
sentences.chinese: 這減少了工作的複雜性，並可以提供運行時性能改進。

sentences.english: He deposits ten dollars, and the computer lights up and asks for the urine sample.
sentences.chinese: 付過10塊錢後，電腦啓動了，並提示他提供尿樣。

sentences.english: Sippy and directed by Ramesh Sippy, released in 1975.
sentences.chinese: 播出，並指示由拉梅什風格，發表於1975年。

sentences.english: Remove the old faucet and scrape any old putty or caulk from the basin.
sentences.chinese: 拆調舊水龍頭，並颳去洗槽舊的膩子或填充物。

sentences.english: Ensure compliance to Crowne Plaza Keys mandatories and implementation of new standards.
sentences.chinese: 確保編輯皇冠假日主要條款並執行新標準。

sentences.english: This, it appears, is the legacy I have received and have now bequeathed to my own child.
sentences.chinese: 而這，正是我已收到並留給自己孩子的遺產。

definition: will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
